clinical_study.brief_title: Development of a MR Scanner Capable of Being Sited in a Neonatal Intensive Care Unit
clinical_study.official_title: Development of MR Scanner Capable of Being Sited in a Neonatal Intensive Care Unit

brief_summary.textblock:
The investigational device studied is an MR Scanner for neonates and infants with a small size profile that makes it capable of being sited in a NICU or other neonatal and infant care units.
The study hypothesis is to demonstrate feasibility of attaining diagnostic quality images and data using the MR scanner for neonates and infants with various hardware and software configurations.

primary_outcome.description: To collect images and associated data using the 3.0T MR scanner for neonates and infants that demonstrates the feasibility by site completed surveys of use in clinical neonate and infant populations.

secondary_outcome.description: Image Quality as assessed by site radiologist.
To collect usability, workflow and transport data as determined by the site.
